mapper.select: select count(*) as count from (select emp_id as id from emp union select company_id from company) where id = #{id}
select dept_code, dept_name, dept_no from dept order by dept_no asc
select position_code, position_name, position_no from position order by position_no asc
mapper.insert: insert into emp values(concat('EMP', LPAD(EMP_SEQ.nextval, 4, 0)), #{empId}, #{empPassword}, #{empName}, #{empPhone}, #{empEmail}, #{addressSeq}, #{deptCode}, #{positionCode}, #{empImg}, sysdate, null, '0' )
mapper.select: select * from( select address_code from divy_address where do like '%' || #{main} || '%' and si like '%' || #{sub} || '%' ) where rownum = 1
select * from( select address_seq from address_list order by 1 desc ) where rownum = 1
select approval from ( select emp_id as id, approval from emp union select company_id, approval from company ) where id = #{id}
select * from( select emp_id as id, emp_name as name, emp_email as email from emp union select company_id, company_name, company_email from company ) where id = #{id}

select product_info.product_code, product_name, common_code_details.code_name as product_type_name, product_info.product_type, lclas, sclas, unit_price, vl, img, product_info.unit_name, common_code_details_2.code_name as unit_name_name from product_info left join product_category on product_info.product_code = product_category.product_code join common_code_details on product_info.product_type = common_code_details.comm_detail_code join common_code_details common_code_details_2 on product_info.unit_name = common_code_details_2.comm_detail_code where product_info.product_code like '%' || #{productCode} || '%' and product_name like '%' || #{productName} || '%' and product_info.product_type like '%' || #{productType} || '%' and lclas like '%' || #{lclas} || '%' and sclas like '%' || #{sclas} || '%' and unit_price >= #{minPrice} and unit_price <= #{maxPrice} order by 1

select count(product_info.product_code) from product_info left join product_category on product_info.product_code = product_category.product_code join common_code_details on product_info.product_type = common_code_details.comm_detail_code where product_info.product_code like '%' || #{productCode} || '%' and product_name like '%' || #{productName} || '%' and product_info.product_type like '%' || #{productType} || '%' and lclas like '%' || #{lclas} || '%' and sclas like '%' || #{sclas} || '%' and unit_price >= #{minPrice} and unit_price <= #{maxPrice}
select code_name as unit_name, comm_detail_code as unit_name_name from common_code_details where comm_code = 'UN'
mapper.update: update product_info set product_name = #{productName}, product_type = #{productType}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, vl = #{vl}, img = #{img}, unit_name = #{unitName} where product_code = #{productCode}
mapper.select: select company_code, company_name from company where company_name like '%' || #{companyName} || '%'
select comm_detail_code as product_code, code_name as size_name from common_code_details where comm_detail_code like 'SI%'

select option_code, product_code, product_color, product_size, code_name as size_name, unit_price, discontinued from product_option join common_code_details on product_option.product_size = common_code_details.comm_detail_code where product_code = #{productCode}
